title: GRID Autosport v1.0RC9 incl. DLC Linux AMD64
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS VERSION OF THE GAME IS INTENDED FOR LINUX SYSTEMS ONLY


    Included DLCs:
======================
Drag Pack
Touring Legends Pack
Road & Track Car Pack
Sprint Pack
CoupÃ© Style Pack
Best of British Pack
Boost Pack
Black Edition Pack
Premium Garage Pack
Demoman Derby Pack
High Res Texture Pack


How to install:
======================
1. tar -xvf GRID.Autosport.v1.0RC9.build.23549.incl.11.DLC.Linux.tar.xz
2. cd 'GRID Autosport'
3. chmod + x run_game.sh && chmod + x ./steam-runtime/run.sh
4. ./run_game.sh

Installing libraries to run the game is not required. The game starts with a local Steam Runtime.


Source: http://kickasstorrents.to/grid-autosport-v1-0rc9-build-23549-incl-11-dlc-linux-native-amd64-t11739348.html
